overview.summary: This module implements a volume renderer using 3D texture hardware.

description.p: The Rendering Style Frame allows the selection of standard (Over Operator), maximum intensity projection (MIP) or attenuated (Attenuate) rendering styles.

For large data, the View Mode, allows the user view the data at full resolution, or to see the maximum resolution along a line of sight or in a region of influence. The line of sight and region of influence modes are controlled by a selection widget in the view window.
The Interpolation Mode specifies linear interpolation (Interpolate) or nearest neighbor interpolation (Nearest).

The slice transparency slider allows the user to control the slice transparency in concert with the transparency specified in the transfer function that was provided to the GLTextureBuilder. The range is from -1 (full transparency for each slice) to 0 (accept the values in the transfer function) to 1 (full opacity for each slice--except for regions that are zero in the transfer function)
The number of slices slider controls rendering quality. Increase the number of slices to improve rendering quality. Decrease the number of slice to improve interaction.
